Value.label: Invert switch
Value.Help: Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON if the switch was installed upside down.

Value.label: Remote level percent
Value.Help: Indicates how much each level dims/brightens as a portion of the whole range when set remotely.

Value.label: Remote duration per level
Value.Help: Indicates the time duration of each level when set remotely.

Value.label: Local level percent
Value.Help: Indicates how much each level dims/brightens as a portion of the whole range when set locally.

Value.label: Local duration per level
Value.Help: Indicates the time duration of each level when set locally.
